summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 HYUNDAI TUCSON. WHILE ATTEMPTING TO TURN RIGHT FROM A COMPLETE STOP, THE VEHICLE HESITATED AND FAILED TO ACCELERATE FOR SEVERAL SECONDS. THE FAILURE LATER RECURRED WHILE THE CONTACT WAS TURNING LEFT. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO RTE 2 HYUNDAI (743 N MAIN ST, LEOMINSTER, MA 01453), BUT THE DEALER WAS UNABLE TO DIAGNOSE ANY FAILURES WITH THE VEHICLE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND ADVISED THE CONTACT TO GO BACK TO THE GENERAL MANAGER AT RTE 2 HYUNDAI. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 5,524.  UPDATED 08/29/17*LJ    *CN
